title: Coping with deafness
creator_credit: Richard Dobson and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: Bob, Maree and Sadie have hearing impairment. They have illustrated, by means of their own simple sketches, how deafness has affected their lives and how they cope with their disability. Interviewer: Pat Pengilley.
